entries.text: Relinquish souls, and return to last bonfire?
Items you were unable to carry were left behind
You do not have enough of the required item: %s
You do not have enough of the required item
Does not open from this side
Cannot use bonfire while phantom is present
Bonfire dormant while foes lurk nearby
The area around this bonfire was severed from other worlds
The creatures near this bonfire live again, with renewed vigor.
Ask her to move path? Souls needed: %d
[ChrName] Offer souls to grave? Souls needed: %d
You already belong to this covenant
Your devotion to your covenant has deepened
Your devotion to your covenant has deepened, and you have gained a rank.
There is nothing more to offer. You have done fine work.
Cannot enter covenant with phantom present
You belong to another covenant. Abandon that covenant to join another?
You must belong to this covenant to make an offering
Cannot abandon covenant with phantom present
You can now join the Dragon Remnants covenant
Join the Heirs of the Sun covenant?
Join the Brotherhood of Blood covenant?
Join the Way of Blue covenant?
Join the Company of Champions covenant?
Join the Pilgrims of Dark covenant?
Abandon your covenant and join the Heirs of the Sun?
Abandon your covenant and join the Blue Sentinels?
Abandon your covenant and join the Brotherhood of Blood?
Abandon your covenant and join the Way of Blue?
Abandon your covenant and join the Rat King covenant?
Abandon your covenant and join the Bell Keeper covenant?
Abandon your covenant and join the Dragon Remnants covenant?
Abandon your covenant and join the Company of Champions?
Abandon your covenant and join the Pilgrims of Dark?
This will set you upon an arduous path. Okay to join this covenant?
Are you prepared to join this covenant?
The bonfire resonates, invigorating nearby foes
Produce the symbol of the King
The remnants of ancient souls return
If only we had the strength of the Giants...
The ashen mist has served its purpose...
One cannot reside within memory for long
You may level up by the power of the Emerald Herald
Some force has strengthened the Estus Flask
Giants crossed the seas, perhaps in homecoming
Invading the world of the guilty as an arbiter spirit...
What is done cannot be undone
First, defeat the lord of this quarter...
The Human Effigy blocks invaders from beyond
The effect of the Human Effigy has faded
The connection to other worlds was restored
Do not lament; there will be another day
Spar with others possessing Tokens of Fidelity. The victors demonstrate devotion to their covenants.
Holders of the Bell Keeper's Seal are obliged to expunge invaders from other worlds. Success demonstrates deep devotion to covenant.
Duel other holders of Tokens of Spite. The victors demonstrate devotion to their covenants.
Subjects of the Rat King must exterminate invaders. Success demonstrates deep devotion to covenant.
⑪： Target Lock/Release ⑰ While target locked： Change Target
Hold ①： Wield left weapon two-handed
⑦ After breaking guard： Critical Hit
⑦/⑨ During enemy attack： Counter Attack
⑦ Behind enemy's back： Critical Hit
⑩/⑧ With shield equipped： Parry (repel enemy's attack)
⑩/⑧ With shield equipped： Spell Parry (repel enemy's spell)
⑦ After successful parry： Critical Hit
⑧/⑩ With bow equipped： Use Bow (Manual aiming mode)
⑳ While on ladder： Let go of ladder
⑱ + Hold ⑳： While on ladder： Slide down ladder
●/●/●/● Right-click and drag mouse : Move Camera
● While target locked (Move mouse right): Change Target
●/● (Shift + Mouse wheel up/down): Switch equipped weapons
●/● After breaking guard (Left/Right-click mouse): Critical Hit
●/● During enemy attack (Left/Right-click mouse): Counter Attack
●/● Behind enemy's back (Left/Right-click mouse): Critical Hit
●/● With shield equipped (Double left/right-click mouse): Parry (repel enemy's attack)
●/● With shield equipped (Double left/right-click mouse): Spell Parry (repel enemy's spell)
●/● After successful parry (Left/Right-click mouse): Critical Hit
●/● With bow equipped (Left/Right-click mouse): Use Bow (Manual aiming mode)
● While on ladder: Let go of ladder
● + ●/● While on ladder: Slide down ladder
Bonfires are places of respite You may also light torches on them
Resting at a bonfire replenishes your Estus Flask
Resting at a bonfire revives enemies
Restore equipment durability by resting at a bonfire
At a bonfire, you may instantly travel to other bonfires
Burning an Ember of Adversity will enrage the bonfire's flames, strengthening nearby enemies.
In the dark, enemies' vision is also impaired
When poisoned, your HP will diminish
When bleeding, your HP and stamina will diminish
The heavier your equipment, the slower your movement
Long falls cause damage based on height of drop
Equipment durability will diminish with use, and equipment becomes ineffective once broken
Attacking, blocking, dashing and so on all use stamina. When your stamina is depleted, you won't be able to perform any of these actions
Your attack power increases when two-handing a weapon
Use a Human Effigy to return to the living
When you die, a bloodstain is left behind. Touch your bloodstain to reclaim your lost souls
Restore broken equipment functionality by repairing it
Reinforce weapons and armor to improve stats
Infuse your weapon to grant it special characteristics
You may summon phantoms from other worlds by using the White Sign Soapstone
A Golem rests nearby, thirsting for souls...
Pray at the grave to converse with the dead
If only you had a shield...
If only you had a torch...
The nature of your being has changed
The sign written here is being channelled from somewhere far away
An ancient crown is now yours
A faint heat lingers in the ancient crown
Forbidden is the path to the ancient king's domain
The city of the Sunken King sleeps, as does the dragon within
With water dry, and path amiss, woeful temptation is dismissed
Trespassers will face adversity befitting a monarch
In the tower of the Old Iron King resides a Child of Dark
Eleum Loyce, land of the Ivory King, lies cold as death, nary a hint of warmth remaining
Nadalia is no more. True Soul of Nadalia acquired.
The gale blowing through Eleum Loyce has ceased
The path to Chaos lies open
Alsanna's seal is undone, and the winds of Eleum Loyce are ceased
A knight of Eleum Loyce seeks the Chaos...
Heat radiates from the ancient crowns
Dark spirit Prowlers has been vanquished.
When light is revealed, the shadows rise...
